page.title: 06** A DAY IN MY LIFE **
page.content: When I wake up I get washed, brush my teeth and get dressed. After that I go down and get my breakfast. Next we have to get our bags and coats and go to school. Our Mum crosses us over the main road and then we go the way where we drop Sarah, my younger sister,off at her school then I and Susan, my twin sister, go to our school. In our school we learn English,Maths, French, Geography, Science and many more things. The day goes very quickly. I like most teachers at our school. Today I do English, Maths, French and Games. When I get home I wash my hands, go upstairs and get changed. Then I play in the garden until my tea is ready. After tea I go out for a ride on my bike to my friend who lives in another street. After playing I watch television. Later I go to bed. {By David Fletcher. St. James Middle.
